## Load the data here:
```{r echo=FALSE}
birth_rate_data <- read_csv("all_data.csv")

```

## Interactive Data Analysis:
```{r echo=FALSE}
selectInput('country',
            label = "Select Country",
            choices = birth_rate_data$`Country Name`)

renderPlot({
birth_rate_data %>%
  gather('year','birth_rate',"2000":"2020") %>%
  filter(`Country Name` == input$country)%>%
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = birth_rate, group = 1))+
  geom_point()+
    geom_line()
})


```
